74085.「外へ出る前に お兄さまの部屋を\n もう一度 見ておきたいの。:
I'd like to take another look at your
brother's room before I go out.

88104.グランゼドーラ城 １階へ行く\nエレベーターがある。\nエレベーターに乗って 移:
Gran Zedora Castle There is an
elevator that goes to the first floor.<yesno><close>

74086.「あなたがたには お話しするが\n グランドタイタス号が ここに着けなかったのは:
I must tell you that the Grand Titus could not get here because of the seal that surrounds Lendersia. But the
other day, that ship suddenly entered the harbor. We were all so happy to see her, and a few days later Princess
Anlucia returned as well.

74087.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「グランドタイタ:
The Grand Titus has been away for a while because her boat broke down and she was being repaired on Lendor
Island. That's good. We will miss the Grand Titus so much when it doesn't come to this port. I'm glad that we
can always go to the five continents side of the world.

74088.「こちらは グランゼドーラ城への入り口です。\n ここから入って 中のエレベータ:
This is the entrance to Gran Zedora Castle. You can enter from here and use the elevator inside to get out to
the first floor of Gran Zedora Castle.

74089.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「レンドア島から:
I jumped on a boat bound for Gran Zedora from Lendor Island! One of Lendersia's specialties is Melsandy
Village's bread! I'm definitely going to eat there!

74090.「こっちは 城下町への入り口だ。\n 中のエレベーターを使えば グランゼドーラの:
This is the entrance to Castle Town.
The elevator inside will take you to
the Castle Town of Gran Zedora.

74091.「グランドタイタス号があって おどろきました？\n レンドア島と グランゼドーラ:
Are you surprised to see the Grand Titus? The passage between Lendor Island and the Gran Zedora Kingdom is
finally open! This is thanks to the new Magic Compass created by Sage Hollow. You can hear more about it on
board. Now, let's see...

74092.「本船 グランドタイタス号は\n レンドア島を目指して 出港いたします。\n<b:
The Grand Titus will sail to Lendor Island. Titus Boarding Pass holders can board the ship for 200 gold. Would
you like to board the Grand Titus?

74094.「申し訳ありませんが お金が足りないようです。\n またの ご乗船を お待ちして:
I am sorry, but we seem to be short of
money. We look forward to seeing you
on board again.

74095.「それでは 乗船料の\n ２００ゴールドを いただきます。\n さあ グランドタ:
I will now charge you 200 gold for
boarding. Please come on board the
Grand Titus.

78957.「ねえ 知ってる？ グランドタイタス号が\n 運行を始める前 このレンダーシアは:
Hey, you know what? Before the Grand Titus started its operation, non-human races were banned from landing here in
Lendersia. I don't know why they did that.

78958.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「メルサンディ村:
I went to Melsandy Village and ate a lot of their famous bread. Where should we go next? I'm also interested
in the Arena in the Kingdom of Al- Ahagiro.

78959.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「レンダーシアを:
It seems that the seal that surrounds Lendersia has not yet been broken. The Grand Titus seems to be navigating
without any problems, but is it really safe as it is?

102440.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ねえ あなたは:
Hey, did you hear? The hero princess of the castle defeated the Great Demon King! The hero princess is always
accompanied by a person named Ally, and I heard that this person is extremely strong.

102441.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「こないだ アラ:
I went to the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro the other day. I went to see the Monster Arena! I would like to visit
Pyramid next time.

102442.「大魔王が 倒されたというのに\n レンダーシアを包む封印は\n いまだ 解ける:
Even though the Great Demon King has been defeated, the seal that surrounds Lendersia shows no sign of being
broken. However, this has become a regular scene. Well, one can get used to anything.

88126.グランゼドーラ王国（真の世界）に\n到着したようだ。:
It seems we have arrived at the Gran
Zedora Kingdom (the world of the
true).
